messages: 🎂 Today's baby is {{pronoun}} *{{name}}* who turns {{age}} years old! 🥳🎉 Congratulations {{name}} ❤️
🎂 Today is *{{name}}*'s day who celebrates {{age}} years! 🥳🎉 Congratulations {{name}} ❤️
🎂 What an epic day! {{pronounUp}} *{{name}}* turns {{age}} years old today! 🥳🎉 Congratulations {{name}} ❤️
🎂 {{pronounUp}} our *{{name}}* turns {{age}} years old today! 🥳🎉 Congratulations {{name}} ❤️
welcomeGroup:
👋 *{{chatTitle}}*!
I am a bot 🤖 that helps you register all the birthdays of the members of this group. To learn more about the available commands, type /help.
helpMessage:
These are the commands you can use:
 - /add - To add a birthday person, with name and date separated by commas (for example, `/add Samuel, 1994-03-21`)
 - /remove - To remove a birthday person (`/remove Pedro`)
 - /birthdays - List of birthday persons, ordered by the next one to have a birthday.
 - /ages - List by ages.
 - /next - Shows more information about the next birthday.
 - /birthdaybot - To tell the bot what you want it to do (for example, `/birthdaybot add Pedro on April 15, 1980`).
